# OLS estimation

```{r ols}

ols_mod = plm(formula = "synch ~ bank_int + trade",model = "within",
    effect = "twoways", index = c("countrypair","date"), data = df)

```


# IV estimation

```{r}

iv_mod = plm(formula = "synch ~ bank_int + trade | fsap_ind + trade",model = "within",
    effect = "twoways", index = c("countrypair","date"), data = df)

```
